CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND(LEN( Apttus_QPConfig__PriceListId__c ) > 0,TEXT( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c )<> "Accepted",Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c,TEXT(Is_Startrack_Proposal__c) <> ''),
IF(RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Proposal' && $Profile.Name != 'Pricing Management', HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Config2__Cart?businessObjectId=" &Id+"&flow=NewQuote"&"&useAdvancedApproval=true&useDealOptimizer=true&cntrNbr_1="& APT_Contract_Id__c , IMAGE("/resource/APT_Add", "Add"),"_parent"),
IF(RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Proposal' && $Profile.Name == 'Pricing Management', HYPERLINK("https://auspost--ptest--apttus-config2.visualforce.com/apex/Apttus_Config2__Cart?businessObjectId=" &Id+"&flow=Approval flow"&"&useAdvancedApproval=true&useDealOptimizer=true&cntrNbr_1="& APT_Contract_Id__c , IMAGE("/resource/APT_Add", "Add"),"_self"),
IF((RecordType.DeveloperName == 'APT_Renewal_Quote' || RecordType.DeveloperName == 'APT_Amendment_Quote') && $Profile.Name == 'Pricing Management', HYPERLINK("https://auspost--ptest--apttus-config2.visualforce.com/apex/Apttus_Config2__Cart?businessObjectId=" &Id+"&flow=Approval flow"&"&useAdvancedApproval=true&useDealOptimizer=true&cntrNbr_1="& APT_Contract_Id__c , IMAGE("/resource/APT_Add", "Add"),"_self"),
IF( (RecordType.DeveloperName == 'APT_Renewal_Quote' || RecordType.DeveloperName == 'APT_Amendment_Quote') ,HYPERLINK("https://auspost--ptest--apttus-config2.visualforce.com/apex/Apttus_Config2__Cart?businessObjectId=" &Id+"&flow=RenewalQuote"&"&useAdvancedApproval=true&useDealOptimizer=true&cntrNbr_1="& APT_Contract_Id__c , IMAGE("/resource/APT_Add", "Add"),"_self"), HYPERLINK("https://auspost--ptest--apttus-config2.visualforce.com/apex/Apttus_Config2__Cart?businessObjectId=" &Id&"&useAdvancedApproval=true&useDealOptimizer=true", IMAGE("/resource/APT_Add", "Add"),"_self"))))), NULL)
CustomField.label: Add Products Test Hello
